message: I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor, which is fair considering we both need to come to an agreement quickly to avoid losing value to inflation.
I understand we both want to minimize inflation losses. Let's settle for a 55-45 split in my favor this time, as the value of the money is decreasing for me.
Let's meet in the middle with a 52-48 split. We've both lost value to inflation already, and continuing to negotiate will only hurt us both. This is a fair compromise.
